description: JRuby runs on the JVM to bring high levels of performance and parallelism to your long running ruby code. TorqueBox is a performant and scaleable application server that reduces the complexity and dependencies of rack based web applications. See how these two tools can be used to simplify your ruby web development while delivering excellent performance under heavy loads with some real world examples.
title: Rack based web apps with JRuby and TorqueBox - Chris Spring
